message: Let's split it 90/10. I'm being generous, but I want to get this done quickly.
Your offer was unfair. Let's be reasonable, I'm proposing a 65/35 split.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need more than 35%.  Let's split it 80/20 this time.  If we keep going, inflation will hurt you more than me.
This is my final offer.  55/45.  I'm taking a significant hit from inflation to close this deal.
